00027 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00028  * Select queries -- these whitespace seperated list macros are a list of
00029  * rdf predicates and/or ordinals (specified as []). These predicate lists
00030  * specify a path to traverse through an RDF graph (comprised of statements,
00031  * aka triples). Each select query starts at the top level resource and
00032  * 'selects' another node in the rdf graph by moving through the graph
00033  * as specified by the predicate list. The URI of the new node, will be
00034  * saved as the 'selected context'. Once a context has been selected,
00035  * you can use the MBE_ queries below to extract metadata out of a context.
00036  * -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037  */
00038 
00043 #define MBI_VARIOUS_ARTIST_ID \
00044         "89ad4ac3-39f7-470e-963a-56509c546377"

/* -------------------------------------------------------------------------
 * Server queries (queries must have argument(s) substituted in them)
 * -------------------------------------------------------------------------
 */

00645 #define MBQ_Authenticate \
    "<mq:AuthenticateQuery>\n" \
00646     "   <mq:username>@1@</mq:username>\n" \
00647     "</mq:AuthenticateQuery>\n" 
00648 
00653 #define MBQ_GetCDInfoFromCDIndexId \
00654     "<mq:GetCDInfo>\n" \
00655     "   <mq:depth>@DEPTH@</mq:depth>\n" \
00656     "   <mm:cdindexid>@1@</mm:cdindexid>\n" \
00657     "</mq:GetCDInfo>\n" 
00658

00675     "<mq:TrackInfoFromTRMId>\n" \
00676     "   <mm:trmid>@1@</mm:trmid>\n" \
00677     "   <mq:artistName>@2@</mq:artistName>\n" \
00678     "   <mq:albumName>@3@</mq:albumName>\n" \
00679     "   <mq:trackName>@4@</mq:trackName>\n" \
00680     "   <mm:trackNum>@5@</mm:trackNum>\n" \
00681     "   <mm:duration>@6@</mm:duration>\n" \
00682     "</mq:TrackInfoFromTRMId>\n"

00765     "   <mq:artistName>@1@</mq:artistName>\n" \
00766     "   <mq:albumName>@2@</mq:albumName>\n" \
00767     "   <mq:trackName>@3@</mq:trackName>\n" \
00768     "   <mm:trmid>@4@</mm:trmid>\n" \
00769     "   <mm:trackNum>@5@</mm:trackNum>\n" \
00770     "   <mm:duration>@6@</mm:duration>\n" \
00771     "   <mm:issued>@7@</mm:issued>\n" \
00772     "   <mm:genre>@8@</mm:genre>\n" \
00773     "   <dc:description>@9@</dc:description>\n" \
00774     "   <mm:link>@10@</mm:link>\n" \
00775     "   <mq:sessionId>@SESSID@</mq:sessionId>\n" \
00776     "   <mq:sessionKey>@SESSKEY@</mq:sessionKey>\n" \
00777     "</mq:SubmitTrack>\n"

00790     " <mm:trmidList>\n" \
00791     "  <rdf:Bag>\n" \
00792     "   <rdf:li>\n" \
00793     "    <mq:trmTrackPair>\n" \
00794     "     <mm:trackid>@1@</mm:trackid>\n" \
00795     "     <mm:trmid>@2@</mm:trmid>\n" \
00796     "    </mq:trmTrackPair>\n" \
00797     "   </rdf:li>\n" \
00798     "  </rdf:Bag>\n" \
00799     " </mm:trmidList>\n" \
00800     " <mq:sessionId>@SESSID@</mq:sessionId>\n" \
00801     " <mq:sessionKey>@SESSKEY@</mq:sessionKey>\n" \
00802     " <mq:clientVersion>@CLIENTVER@</mq:clientVersion>\n" \
00803     "</mq:SubmitTRMList>\n"
